data.comment: The error returned from the API when a request to make the pending price list prices live is made and there are manual overrides that have not been confirmed.

data.name: UpdateVwdCommandHandler_OnlyPendingVwdCanBeUpdated
data.value: A veterinary written directive with a status of '{0}' cannot be updated.
data.comment: The error returned by the API when attempting to updated an Vwd that is not pending.

data.name: UpdateVwdCommandHandler_TonnesCannotBeSetToLessThanTonnesUsed
data.value: The tonnes for the veterinary written directive cannot be set to less than the tonnes used.
data.comment: The error returned by the API when setting the tonnes for a Vwd to less than the tonnes used.

data.name: UpdateOrderLineCommandHandler_UpdateOrderLine_VwdHasInsufficientTonnes
data.value: The vwd associated with this order line does not have sufficient tonnes for the new order line quantity.
data.comment: The error returned during the updating of an order line when the vwd associated with the order line does not have sufficient tonnes for the new order line quantity.

data.name: CreateLoadRequestCommandHandler_LoadRequestAlreadyExistsForLoad
data.value: The loading of load {0} has already been requested.
data.comment: The error returned by the API when creating a load request for a load that has already been requested.

data.name: CreateCustomerCommandHandler_UnableToAssignCustomerCode
data.value: Unable to assign a code for the new customer. Please contact your administrator.
data.comment: The error returned during customer creation if we are unable to assign a customer code, due to the codes being used already in ABM.

data.name: CreateLoadRequestCommandHandler_NoOrderLinesFoundForLoading
data.value: No order lines found for loading on load {0}
data.comment: The error returned during the creation of a load request when there are no order lines found for loading.

data.name: CreateCompletedLoadRequestItemCommandHandler_LoadIsCancelled
data.value: Load {0} has been cancelled.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to create a completed load request item for a load that has been cancelled.

data.name: CreateCompletedLoadRequestItemCommandHandler_OrderLineIsNotPending
data.value: Order line {0}-{1} is not pending loading. The status the order line is {2}
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to create a completed load request item for an order line that is not pending.

data.name: CreateLoadRequestCommandHandler_LoadIsCancelled
data.value: Load {0} has been cancelled.
data.comment: The error returned when creating a load request for a cancelled load.

data.name: LoadOrderLinesCommandHandler_LoadIsCancelled
data.value: Load {0} has been cancelled.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to load order lines for a load that has been cancelled.

data.name: LoadOrderLineWeighmentCommandHandler_LoadIsCancelled
data.value: Load {0} has been cancelled.
data.comment: The error returned when creating a weighment for an order line on a load that has been cancelled.

data.name: LoadOrderLineWeighmentCommandHandler_OrderLineStatusIsNotPending
data.value: The order line is not pending loading. The status of the order line is {0}
data.comment: The error returned when creating a weighment for an order line that is not pending loading.

data.name: UpdateFirstWeighmentCommandHandler_LoadIsCancelled
data.value: Load {0} has been cancelled.
data.comment: The error returned when updating a weighment for a load that has been cancelled.

data.name: CreateMedicationCommandHandler_ProductCodeExistsInAbm
data.value: A product already exists in ABM with the code '{0}'.
data.comment: The error returned during the creation of a medication, if the medication already exists in ABM

data.name: LoadOrderLineWeighmentCommandHandler_LoadRequestAlreadyExistsForOrderLine
data.value: The loading of order line '{2}' for order '{1}' has already been requested for load number '{0}'
data.comment: The error returned when creating the first weighment for an order line, when loading of the order line has already been requested.

data.name: UpdateSecondWeighmentCommandHandler_LoadRequestAlreadyExistsForOrderLine
data.value: The loading of order line '{2}' for order '{1}' has already been requested for load number '{0}'
data.comment: The error returned when creating the second weighment for an order line, when loading of the order line has already been requested.

data.name: CreateBagLabelCommandHandler_LabelTemplateRequiresMedication
data.value: Label template '{0}' requires a medication.
data.comment: The error returned during label creation when a medication code is not provided for a template that requires a medication.

data.name: CaptureDeliverySiteEstimatesCoordinatesCommandHandler_UnableToCaptureGpsCoordinates
data.value: Unable to capture the co-ordinates for delivery site id {0}. Please review the site address.
data.comment: The error returned during the GPS capture process for a delivery site, if no co-ordinates can be found for the site address.

data.name: AddIngredientToFormulationCommandHandler_FormulationIsExternalError
data.value: Formulation code '{0}' is an external formulation. Ingredients cannot be added.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to add an ingredient to an external formulation.

data.name: RemoveIngredientFromFormulationCommandHandler_FormulationIsExternalError
data.value: Formulation code '{0}' is an external formulation. Ingredients cannot be removed.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to remove an ingredient from an external formulation.

data.name: UpdateFormulationIngredientCommandHandler_FormulationIsExternalError
data.value: Formulation code '{0}' is an external formulation. Ingredients cannot be updated.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to update an ingredient in an external formulation.

data.name: CreateOrderLineCommandHandler_VwdExpiryDateInvalid
data.value: Script number '{0}' cannot be used for the order line. The date required of the order line is after the expiry date of the vwd.
data.comment: The error message returned when creating an order line with a vwd that expires before the date required of the order line

data.name: CreateOrderLineCommandHandler_VwdStartDateInvalid
data.value: Script number '{0}' cannot be used for the order line. The earliest date of the order line is before the start date of the vwd.
data.comment: The error message returned when creating an order line with a vwd that starts after the earliest date of the order line

data.name: DeliverySiteApplicationService_Create_CustomerAlreadyHasSiteWithGivenName
data.value: The customer already has a delivery site named '{0}'. Delivery site names for customers must be unique.
data.comment: The error returned during delivery site creation if the customer already has a delivery site with the given name.

data.name: DeliverySiteApplicationService_Update_CustomerAlreadyHasSiteWithGivenName
data.value: The customer already has a delivery site named '{0}'. Delivery site names for customers must be unique.
data.comment: The error returned during delivery site updates if the customer already has a delivery site with the given name.

data.name: ApplyPendingPricesProcessManagerInProgress
data.value: The live prices are currently in the process of being updated. Please try again later.
data.comment: The error returned when attempting to update data in the pending prices module, when a process to apply live price updates is running.

data.name: UpdateDeliveryOptionAdjustmentsCommandHandler_CurrencyIdDoesNotExist
data.value: Currency {0} does not exist.
data.comment: The error message returned when CurrencyIds are not found during the updating of price adjustments for a delivery option.

data.name: UpdatePendingCustomerSpecificPriceChangesCommandHandler_PriceNotConfiguredManually
data.value: Only pending prices that were created manually can be updated.
data.comment: The error returned when a request is made to update a pending customer price that was not applied manually

data.name: UpdatePendingPriceListPriceChangeCommandHandler_PriceNotConfiguredManually
data.value: Only pending prices that were created manually can be updated.
data.comment: The error returned when a request is made to update a pending price list price that was not applied manually

data.name: DeletePendingCustomerSpecificPriceUpdateCommandHandler_PriceNotConfiguredManually
data.value: Only pending prices that were created manually can be deleted.
data.comment: The error returned when a request is made to delete a pending customer price that was not applied manually

data.name: DeletePendingPriceListPriceUpdateCommandHandler_PriceNotConfiguredManually
data.value: Only pending prices that were created manually can be deleted.
data.comment: The error returned when a request is made to delete a pending price list price that was not applied manually

data.name: CreateApplyPendingPricesProcessCommandHandler_NoPriceUpdatesToApply
data.value: There are no pending price changes to apply.
